text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Eluktronics N857EK1 Premium Gaming Laptop - Intel i7 CPU NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti GPU Windows 10 Home 15.6” 60Hz Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 8GB DDR4 RAM & 256GB PCIe SSD is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Eluktronics N857EK1 Premium Gaming Laptop - Intel i7 CPU NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti GPU Windows 10 Home 15.6” 60Hz Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 8GB DDR4 RAM & 256GB PCIe SSD is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

A definite 5 stars!
